message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but remember the money loses value with each round!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!

I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
Let's split it down the middle.  The money is shrinking fast, and we're both losing out.  It's time to be reasonable.
